value:
I'm bored. Are you going to give me
something to do, or would you really
rather I just stand here?

I wonder how long it took Lord
Sombron to notice my absence.
Or indeed, if he noticed at all.

You poor thing! You look worn out.
Why not take a little nap? I can run
things around the castle for a while...

A happy family of Heroes living in
harmony... Oh, how I would love to
turn them on each other!

Why yes, I have been watching you.
I simply like to know what you're
getting up to. Is that a crime?

Is this the right place? All these
castles look the same... Anyway,
$Nf says hello.

You cannot begin to grasp a Mage
Dragon's full power.

Did I improve or didn't I? It's a simple
question.

My, you do nag, don't you? What
happened to "just do your best"?

Such sweet attention! It seems
someone is fond of me.

I am Zephia, a Mage Dragon who has
lived thousands of years. If I am to
serve you, I need something in return.

A fine day, isn't it? Diminished only
somewhat by a question that's been
bothering me...$k$pSummoner, why did you bring
me here? Was it a passing fancy?
An accident?$k$pAnd why, since my arrival, have you
shown me such kindness? I simply
do not understand.$k$pIf it is my heart you want, you won't
have it. I seek family. People who
love me and only me.$k$pBecause your attention is split among
countless others, undivided love is
something you cannot give.$k$pSo, as fond as I am of you, you will
have to content yourself with being
second to Lord Sombron.
No quarter!
You've been naughty.
What a nuisance.
We Hounds have triumphed!
Lord Sombron...
Hilarious.
I trust that we'll be friendly during my stay, won't we, dear summoner?
Curious about my horns? All right, you can touchâ€”just this once.
Since you summoned me, you must take good care of me...or else.
There are no Emblem rings in this world, are there? I suppose that's fine. Less bloodshed that way.
You remind me of someone I know. She's an obnoxious little gnat too.
Lord Sombron... I wonder if you miss me at all.

My dear, sweet summoner. You have my cooperation. If it's my undying devotion
you seek, then you will need to show me the same in return.
Speak.
What is it this time?
I'm listening.
